Great game, not sure why so many people hate on this game. People tilt to easily and most of the time its them thats the problem. Its fun, its competitive, and there are endless play styles.

Courtesy of @patryk I agree 100%

It was incredible once, but it was destroyed by the greed and incompetence of it's own creators. Now they dragged it here, like many other companies, to get it off life support. 

Blizzard, either revert this trash back to OW1, as it was on day 1, and start over.

or

Pull the plug and fuck off.

Unique and good game, especially if you're casual. Anyone suggesting that this game is worse than OW1 was probably bronze. Monetization is fair, people just mad their 60$ box game didn't come with unlimited updates for 50 years
Tenho 99% de certeza de que ninguÃ©m lÃª as crÃ­ticas, entÃ£o direi que sou gay
O MESMO JOGO DOIS MUDA PORRA NENHUMA TODO DESBALANCIADO SO LANÃ‡A SUPORTE E TANK E MESMO ASSIM EU CONTINUO JOGANDO POR QUE EU QUERO FAZER O QUE NE BLIZZARD

I don't care about the PVE content fiasco. Each "limited time" PVE event they did so far was middling at best. Still a horribly mismanaged live service title that was far more enjoyable in its first year than now. Its not exactly that I disagreed with the game's vision, but more so OW had years of number adjustment balance patches all done by a balance team with obviously didn't play the game outside of "work". I don't like MOBAs so my hot/cold take is that the 24 at launch was more than enough heroes, we didn't need a content dripfeed where new maps came slower than heroes.

The big positives is the hit detection and overbearing moderation were annoying for 2016 standards, but compared to the cucked experience of modern FPS titles its not all too bad, people can still release some "steam" in chat. I also hit 165fps @1440p on my ancient PC so the optimization team deserves some credit.

Overwatch 2 was announced as a buy-once-and-play PvE sequel with customisation skill trees for characters.
Overwatch 2 is a balance patch in which they removed their principles and a tank to add monetisation where ever they could.

Overwatch 1 shouldn't have died for this.
PLZ ADD A OILED UP TWERKING GAME MODE AND MAYBE ILL SPEND MONEY ON THIS GAME
